segments.text: I have been very busy this year , working late , often taking work home and taking no vacation . I feel exhausted .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should ask for a holiday and relax yourself for a little bit . You worked so hard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right . For the past few weeks , I had no appetite and couldn ’ t sleep well . What ’ s worse my back started aching this Monday . It is time for me to take a vacation .
segments.speaker: S1
